name: Snowy Night
description:
All Snowy wanted was a calm night out in the cold, just rolling around in the snow. -The good life... Now these fiery things from the sky are trying to ruin it and melt him in the process! Help Snowy stay frosty by avoiding the incoming heat.

Controls

Press LEFT side of screen - rotate anti-clockwise and move left

Press RIGHT side of screen - rotate anti-clockwise and move right

Goals
  • Learn to use Box2D
  • Draw all art myself
  • Have fun! 😊😊😊
